block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 2 2 pin required for connection 1st is Trigger pin 2nd is Echo pin

2ms 2ms The trigger pin is will send a pulse of 2ms to cause the ultrasonic transmitter to send 2ms of ultrasonic sound The echo pin is used to receive the ultrasonic sound bounced back from an object in front of the ultrasonic receiver The time of between trigger to echo is used to calculate the distance Distance = (Speed of Sound x Time)
The return value is distance in mm
HC-SR04 continuously reading from HC-SR04 and display the readings
